text: Tenagodus maoria is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Siliquariidae, common name the slit worm snails.Bouchet, P. (2012). Tenagodus maoria (Powell, 1940). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=595436 on 2012-02-11 ==References== * Powell A. W. B., New Zealand Mollusca, William Collins Publishers Ltd, Auckland, New Zealand 1979 ==External links== * Spencer H.G., Willan R.C., Marshall B.A. & Murray T.J. (2011) Checklist of the Recent Mollusca Recorded from the New Zealand Exclusive Economic Zone Category:Siliquariidae Category:Gastropods of New Zealand Category:Gastropods described in 1940
title: Tenagodus maoria
